title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Project Assistant Posts
description: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has recently released the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering can use this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we provided more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment ...
